mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO category (name, alter_id, price) VALUES
(#{category.name},#{category.alterId},#{category.price})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), alter_id= VALUES(alter_id), price = VALUES(price)
mapper.select: SELECT ca.id, ca.name, ca.alter_id, ca.price, ca.sum_score, a.name as alterName FROM category ca JOIN alterations a ON ca.alter_id = a.id WHERE alter_id = #{alterId}
